      FlightInfo FlightSqlClient.getExportedKeys(TableRef tableRef, CallOption... options)
      Retrieves a description about the foreign key columns that reference the primary key columns of the given table.
      default FlightInfo FlightSqlProducer.getFlightInfo(FlightProducer.CallContext context, FlightDescriptor descriptor)
      Depending on the provided command, method either: 1.
